snippet: The smartphone, and the larger 6S Plus variant, took center stage at Apple’s product announcement event, but a bigger iPad and a beefed-up Apple TV had turns in the spotlight.
abstract: Apple is attempting to satisfy changing consumer tastes as it introduces new products that once appeared unlikely like a stylus and iPad with keyboard; its iPhone is still hallmark product, generating 56 percent of profits.
lead_paragraph: The smartphone, and the larger 6S Plus variant, took center stage at Apple’s product announcement event, but a bigger iPad and a beefed-up Apple TV had turns in the spotlight.

headline.main: Apple Unveils iPhone 6S, and Breaks Own Taboos With Other Offerings
headline.print_headline: To Keep Winning Customers, Apple Breaks Its Own Taboos
